page.title: 16WHAT'S HAPPENING IN 1985
page.content: Most daily modern things in this world are electric like radios with buttons to turn it off and on, and a circular button to tune into a station to get some music. I like to listen to the radio because it is not just one sort of music.There is pop, classical, Rock and Roll and lots of others. I like Rock and Roll best because it is good for dancing to. There is a Rhodes Centre in Bishops Stortford where you can go to dance. My brother plays all my dad's old rock and roll records on his record player which is electric. Lots of people use electric things every day. Most children watch television every day. Mothers use electric washing machines. Most fathers use electric things in their workshops and other places in the home.
